content:
FedEx Developer Portal will experience interruption from 07/13/2024, 9:00 PM CT - 07/14/2024, 2:00 AM CT.
We apologize for any inconvenience such as slow response or technical difficulties. Thank you for your patience!

Menu
 Developer Portal
Shipment Visibility Webhook
+ CREATE A WEBHOOK
DOCUMENTATION
Details
Overview

Our Shipment Visibility Webhook is a premium integration capability that enables you to subscribe any FedEx account number or tracking number to receive near real time in-transit shipment events, from label creation to delivery of packages, including Picture Proof of Delivery. Subscriptions are currently available for US-based shipment accounts only.

Pricing

Subscribers are charged a monthly fee for each webhook project, based on track number count. Learn more about pricing and subscription details in the Pricing Guide.

SEE PRICING GUIDE

Customer Benefits

Improve recipient confidence with proactive notifications for in-transit changes to Estimated Delivery Date and day of delivery Time Window.
Reduce customer service costs for WISMO (where is my order) calls as well as delivery disputes by providing FedEx Picture Proof of Delivery.
Enhance customer experience by providing near real time notifications on shipment status.
Gain operational efficiencies by receiving real time push update on shipments, instead of continuous polling to check for track updates on every shipment.
VERSION
v1
LAST UPDATED
02/17/2024
Key Features

Get Near Real-time Tracking Event Updates

Tracking event updates pushed in near real-time with a choice to get entire tracking event history or just that event-specific information.

Get Estimated Delivery Date and Time Window Updates

Get updates pushed when estimated delivery date or estimated delivery time window changes.

Picture Proof of Delivery

Get signature or picture record as applicable for your shipment when they are received by the recipient.

Subscribe by tracking number or account number

Tracking number

When you subscribe by tracking number, we’ll push near real-time tracking event updates that are matched to the tracking numbers that you provide through API endpoints.

Account number

When you subscribe by account number, we’ll push near real-time tracking event updates for every shipment matched with your subscribed accounts (inbound, outbound, or bill to third party).

Still have questions? We’ve got answers

What is a webhook and what are the benefits?
Are FedEx webhooks an off-the-shelf solution?
Does FedEx charge a fee for their webhooks?

 

VIEW ALL FAQS

Are you an existing Web Services or FedEx Ship Manager Server Customer? If so, you can still access the Developer Resource Center.
